def draw(self, x, y, fUseCachedChildren = 1):
        # XXX This hard-codes too many geometry constants!
        self.x, self.y = x, y
        self.drawicon()
        self.drawtext()

        if self.state != 'expanded':
            return y+17
        # draw children
        sublist = self.item._GetSubList()
        if not sublist:
            # IsExpandable() was mistaken; that's allowed
            return y+17
        self.kidKeys = []
